text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
  • Include all codes defined in https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/place-of-service-codes/Place_of_Service_Code_Set

name: ServiceDeliveryLocationTypeValueSet
title: Service Delivery Location Type ValueSet
description: Codes describing a role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.  This extended valueset includes the standard HL7 FHIR codes plus CMS Place of Service Codes.
